00052 static int osp_active_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00053 {
00054         struct obd_device       *dev = m->private;
00055 
00056         LPROCFS_CLIMP_CHECK(dev);
00057         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", !dev->u.cli.cl_import->imp_deactive);
00058         LPROCFS_CLIMP_EXIT(dev);
00059         return 0;
00060 }
00061 
00072 static ssize_t
00073 osp_active_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00074                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00075 {
00076         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00077         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00078         int rc;
00079         __s64 val;
00080 
00081         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00082         if (rc)
00083                 return rc;
00084         if (val < 0 || val > 1)
00085                 return -ERANGE;
00086 
00087         LPROCFS_CLIMP_CHECK(dev);
00088         /* opposite senses */
00089         if (dev->u.cli.cl_import->imp_deactive == val)
00090                 rc = ptlrpc_set_import_active(dev->u.cli.cl_import, val);
00091         else
00092                 CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "activate "LPD64": ignoring repeat request\n",
00093                        val);
00094 
00095         LPROCFS_CLIMP_EXIT(dev);
00096         return count;
00097 }
00098 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osp_active);
00099 
00108 static int osp_syn_in_flight_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00109 {
00110         struct obd_device       *dev = m->private;
00111         struct osp_device       *osp = lu2osp_dev(dev->obd_lu_dev);
00112 
00113         if (osp == NULL)
00114                 return -EINVAL;
00115 
00116         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", osp->opd_syn_rpc_in_flight);
00117         return 0;
00118 }
00119 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(osp_syn_in_flight);

00172 static ssize_t osp_syn_changes_seq_write(struct file *file,
00173                                          const char __user *buffer,
00174                                          size_t count, loff_t *off)
00175 {
00176         struct seq_file         *m      = file->private_data;
00177         struct obd_device       *dev    = m->private;
00178         struct osp_device       *osp    = lu2osp_dev(dev->obd_lu_dev);
00179         struct lu_env            env;
00180         int                      rc;
00181 
00182         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_LOCAL);
00183         if (rc != 0)
00184                 return rc;
00185 
00186         rc = dt_sync(&env, &osp->opd_dt_dev);
00187         lu_env_fini(&env);
00188 
00189         return rc == 0 ? count : rc;
00190 }
00191 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osp_syn_changes);

00223 static ssize_t
00224 osp_max_rpcs_in_flight_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00225                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00226 {
00227         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00228         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00229         struct osp_device *osp = lu2osp_dev(dev->obd_lu_dev);
00230         int rc;
00231         __s64 val;
00232 
00233         if (osp == NULL)
00234                 return -EINVAL;
00235 
00236         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00237         if (rc)
00238                 return rc;
00239 
00240         if (val < 1 || val > INT_MAX)
00241                 return -ERANGE;
00242 
00243         osp->opd_syn_max_rpc_in_flight = val;
00244         return count;
00245 }
00246 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osp_max_rpcs_in_flight);

00312 static int osp_create_count_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00313 {
00314         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00315         struct osp_device *osp = lu2osp_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00316 
00317         if (osp == NULL || osp->opd_pre == NULL)
00318                 return 0;
00319 
00320         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", osp->opd_pre_create_count);
00321         return 0;
00322 }
00323 
00334 static ssize_t
00335 osp_create_count_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00336                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00337 {
00338         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00339         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00340         struct osp_device *osp = lu2osp_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00341         int rc, i;
00342         __s64 val;
00343 
00344         if (osp == NULL || osp->opd_pre == NULL)
00345                 return 0;
00346 
00347         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00348         if (rc)
00349                 return rc;
00350 
00351         /* The MDT ALWAYS needs to limit the precreate count to
00352          * OST_MAX_PRECREATE, and the constant cannot be changed
00353          * because it is a value shared between the OSP and OST
00354          * that is the maximum possible number of objects that will
00355          * ever be handled by MDT->OST recovery processing.
00356          *
00357          * If the OST ever gets a request to delete more orphans,
00358          * this implies that something has gone badly on the MDT
00359          * and the OST will refuse to delete so much data from the
00360          * filesystem as a safety measure. */
00361         if (val < OST_MIN_PRECREATE || val > OST_MAX_PRECREATE)
00362                 return -ERANGE;
00363         if (val > osp->opd_pre_max_create_count)
00364                 return -ERANGE;
00365 
00366         for (i = 1; (i << 1) <= val; i <<= 1)
00367                 ;
00368         osp->opd_pre_create_count = i;
00369 
00370         return count;
00371 }
00372 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osp_create_count);
00373 
00382 static int osp_max_create_count_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00383 {
00384         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00385         struct osp_device *osp = lu2osp_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00386 
00387         if (osp == NULL || osp->opd_pre == NULL)
00388                 return 0;
00389 
00390         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", osp->opd_pre_max_create_count);
00391         return 0;
00392 }
00393 
00404 static ssize_t
00405 osp_max_create_count_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00406                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00407 {
00408         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00409         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00410         struct osp_device *osp = lu2osp_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00411         int rc;
00412         __s64 val;
00413 
00414         if (osp == NULL || osp->opd_pre == NULL)
00415                 return 0;
00416 
00417         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00418         if (rc)
00419                 return rc;
00420 
00421         if (val < 0 || val > INT_MAX)
00422                 return -ERANGE;
00423         if (val > OST_MAX_PRECREATE)
00424                 return -ERANGE;
00425 
00426         if (osp->opd_pre_create_count > val)
00427                 osp->opd_pre_create_count = val;
00428 
00429         osp->opd_pre_max_create_count = val;
00430 
00431         return count;
00432 }
00433 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osp_max_create_count);
00434 
00443 static int osp_prealloc_next_id_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00444 {
00445         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00446         struct osp_device *osp = lu2osp_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00447 
00448         if (osp == NULL || osp->opd_pre == NULL)
00449                 return 0;
00450 
00451         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", fid_oid(&osp->opd_pre_used_fid) + 1);
00452         return 0;
00453 }
00454 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(osp_prealloc_next_id);

00586                 return rc;

00589                 return -ERANGE;

00679 {
00680         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00681         __u32 max;

00684         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", max);
00685         return 0;
00686 }

00698 static ssize_t
00699 osp_lfsck_max_rpcs_in_flight_seq_write(struct file *file,
00700                                        const char __user *buffer,
00701                                        size_t count, loff_t *off)
00702 {
00703         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00704         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00705         __s64 val;
00706         int rc;
00707 
00708         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00709         if (rc == 0) {
00710                 if (val < 0)
00711                         return -ERANGE;
00712 
00713                 rc = obd_set_max_rpcs_in_flight(&dev->u.cli, val);
00714         } else {
00715                 count = rc;
00716         }
00717 
00718         return count;
00719 }
00720 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(osp_lfsck_max_rpcs_in_flight);

00805 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_osp_md_vars[] = {
00806         { .name =       "uuid",
00807           .fops =       &osp_uuid_fops                  },
00808         { .name =       "ping",
00809           .fops =       &osp_ping_fops,
00810           .proc_mode =  0222                            },
00811         { .name =       "connect_flags",
00812           .fops =       &osp_connect_flags_fops         },
00813         { .name =       "mdt_server_uuid",
00814           .fops =       &osp_server_uuid_fops           },
00815         { .name =       "mdt_conn_uuid",
00816           .fops =       &osp_conn_uuid_fops             },
00817         { .name =       "active",
00818           .fops =       &osp_active_fops                },
00819         { .name =       "max_rpcs_in_flight",
00820           .fops =       &osp_max_rpcs_in_flight_fops    },
00821         { .name =       "max_rpcs_in_progress",
00822           .fops =       &osp_max_rpcs_in_prog_fops      },
00823         { .name =       "timeouts",
00824           .fops =       &osp_timeouts_fops              },
00825         { .name =       "import",
00826           .fops =       &osp_import_fops                },
00827         { .name =       "state",
00828           .fops =       &osp_state_fops                 },
00829         { .name =       "maxage",
00830           .fops =       &osp_maxage_fops                },
00831         { .name =       "prealloc_status",
00832           .fops =       &osp_pre_status_fops            },
00833 
00834         /* for compatibility reasons */
00835         { .name =       "destroys_in_flight",
00836           .fops =       &osp_destroys_in_flight_fops            },
00837         { .name =       "lfsck_max_rpcs_in_flight",
00838           .fops =       &osp_lfsck_max_rpcs_in_flight_fops      },
00839         { NULL }
00840 };
00841 
00842 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(osp, dt_blksize);
00843 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(osp, dt_kbytestotal);
00844 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(osp, dt_kbytesfree);
00845 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(osp, dt_kbytesavail);
00846 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(osp, dt_filestotal);
00847 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(osp, dt_filesfree);
00848 
00849 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_osp_osd_vars[] = {
00850         { .name =       "blocksize",
00851           .fops =       &osp_dt_blksize_fops            },
00852         { .name =       "kbytestotal",
00853           .fops =       &osp_dt_kbytestotal_fops        },
00854         { .name =       "kbytesfree",
00855           .fops =       &osp_dt_kbytesfree_fops         },
00856         { .name =       "kbytesavail",
00857           .fops =       &osp_dt_kbytesavail_fops        },
00858         { .name =       "filestotal",
00859           .fops =       &osp_dt_filestotal_fops         },
00860         { .name =       "filesfree",
00861           .fops =       &osp_dt_filesfree_fops          },
00862         { NULL }
00863 };
00864 
00870 void osp_lprocfs_init(struct osp_device *osp)
00871 {
00872         struct obd_device       *obd = osp->opd_obd;
00873         struct proc_dir_entry   *osc_proc_dir = NULL;
00874         struct obd_type         *type;
00875         int                      rc;
00876 
00877         if (osp->opd_connect_mdt)
00878                 obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_osp_md_vars;
00879         else
00880                 obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_osp_obd_vars;
00881         if (lprocfs_obd_setup(obd) != 0)
00882                 return;
00883 
00884         rc = lprocfs_add_vars(obd->obd_proc_entry, lprocfs_osp_osd_vars,
00885                               &osp->opd_dt_dev);
00886         if (rc) {
00887                 CERROR("%s: can't register in lprocfs, rc %d\n",
00888                        obd->obd_name, rc);
00889                 return;
00890         }
00891 
00892         sptlrpc_lprocfs_cliobd_attach(obd);
00893         ptlrpc_lprocfs_register_obd(obd);
00894 
00895         if (osp->opd_connect_mdt || !strstr(obd->obd_name, "osc"))
00896                 return;
00897 
00898         /* If the real OSC is present which is the case for setups
00899          * with both server and clients on the same node then use
00900          * the OSC's proc root */
00901         type = class_search_type(LUSTRE_OSC_NAME);
00902         if (type != NULL && type->typ_procroot != NULL)
00903                 osc_proc_dir = type->typ_procroot;
00904         else
00905                 osc_proc_dir = obd->obd_type->typ_procsym;
00906 
00907         if (osc_proc_dir == NULL)
00908                 return;
00909 
00910         /* for compatibility we link old procfs's OSC entries to osp ones */
00911         osp->opd_symlink = lprocfs_add_symlink(obd->obd_name, osc_proc_dir,
00912                                                "../osp/%s", obd->obd_name);
00913         if (osp->opd_symlink == NULL)
00914                 CERROR("cannot create OSC symlink for /proc/fs/lustre/osp/%s\n",
00915                        obd->obd_name);
00916 }
00917 
00918 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
